title: Update callers to use Harness API
description: Update session.go (ResolveAgentType->harness.Resolve, AgentType()->Harness(), s.Model->harness config), daemon.go (AgentType()->Harness(), opts.Model via HarnessConfig), cmd/agent_setup.go (role.GetAgentType->GetHarnessConfig, ResolveAgentType->harness.Resolve, role.Model->role.GetModel()), cmd/dry_run.go (same), cmd/run.go (--agent-type flag->--agent-harness), cmd/role.go (template strings, display). session_test.go and heartbeat_test.go use generic.New() instead of ResolveAgentType.
